column2: Vaccine push back in Santa Cruz  NPR show
column5: www.thisamericanlife.org/... Well today on our program we have stories of public health experts trying to protect the public telling us all to do things that will save our lives in this moment when unprecedented numbers of us are not obeying them. The first is about what it's like to do these jobs while getting so much pushback. I’m in Santa Cruz and I didn’t know how bad the pushback was . The story is worth a listen imho .  www.thisamericanlife.org/...
